sentences.sContent: Luminous intensity is indicated with the symbol I and its unit of measurement is the candela.
sentences.sContent_eng: Luminous intensity is indicated with the symbol I and its unit of measurement is the candela.
sentences.sCn: 其定义符号为I 以及其测量单位表示为烛光。

trans.tranOther: the basic SI unit of luminous intensity; the luminous intensity in a given direction of a source that emits monochromatic radiation of frequency 540 × 1012 hertz and that has a radiant intensity in that direction of () watt per steradian
